Name: 安特卫普的尼洛 Nello in Antwerp
About the game: Nello in Antwerp is a free experience version of A Dog of Flanders (in development), an adventure game about painting.You will play as a young boy in 19th century Belgium, penniless but with an artistic dream of painting. You will use pencil and brush to record the landscape you see. About this game Interact with locals in Antwerp, Belgium, through conversations that include options. Create paintings in various parts of the game world and provide them to specific characters. Get drawing papers and brushes in the game world.
